title: Fact Check: Viral Tik-Tok video showing Italian PM Giuseppe Conte crying is FAKE | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A Tik Tok video of a crying man is being shared online with a claim that he is the Prime minister of Italy and he is crying because he couldn’t save the people of his country.

“Italian Priminister is crying , he is unable to save his country…..it seems huge mountain of death…. very painful video 😥😥…So plz plz don’t make India like Italy….save urself , ur family and save our country…🙏🙏🙏🙏” the caption read.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above video and found the claim to be false.

We extracted the keyframes of the video and put them through Reverse Image Seach after cropping the screengrabs.

On Yandex, a Russian search engine, we found a video link titled, ‘Benny Hinn bows before god’.

Based on the above link, we then ran a keyword search and found the extended version of the above video, which was uploaded on YouTube on August 15, 2010.

According to the video description, this congregation video was taken on August 13, 2010, in Pennsylvania, Philadelphia.



 The person crying in the video is Benny Hinn, who is an Israeli evangelist. He is known for his regular “Miracle Crusades”—revival meeting or faith healing.

The above information proves that the video is almost 10 years old and the man in the video is not the Italian PM Giuseppe Conte. Hence, the above claim is False.
